column6: a van and a car on National Road No 3 (on the new bridge) located in Kampong Bay North
column8: Kampot province caused 2 serious injuries and 4 minor injuries (three women).------Currently
column9: one person is in custody and being questioned.------Traffic was severely disrupted for some time as the large vehicles were removed.------https://postnews.com.kh/local/454702
